Container.Name: SteamDeckRefurbNotifier
Container.Overview: This is free tool that monitors Valve's SteamDeck refurb site to check if any item is available and notify about it via Telegram bot. User has to have existing bot on Telegram.

Config.Name: Telegram chat ID
Config.Description: Chat ID of your telegram account. Obtain it by visiting RawDataBot

Config.Name: Telegram bot access token
Config.Description: Telegram bot access token. Obtain it by visiting BotFather

Config.Name: Check frequency
Config.Description: How often check Valve's web page (in minutes)
